TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageBuffer extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class MessageBuffer Implements IDisposable
public ref class MessageBuffer abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示一个内存缓冲区，该内存缓冲区存储了未来要使用的整个消息。

span.span: Represents a memory buffer that stores an entire message for future consumption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例的正文只可使用或写入一次。The body of a instance can only be consumed or written once. 如果希望不止一次使用 实例，则应该使用 类将整个 实例全部存储到内存。If you wish to consume a instance more than once, you should use the class to completely store an entire instance into memory. 实例是通过调用 实例的 构造的。A instance is constructed by calling of a instance. 然后会创建并返回一个新的 ，它将获得对 的所有权，并将整个内容读取到内存。A new is then created and returned, which assumes ownership of the and reads the entire content into memory. 为了从 检索 的副本，必须调用 的 方法。In order to retrieve a copy of a from the , you must call the method of the . 这会返回您所提供的原始 实例的相同副本。This returns an identical copy of the original instance you provided. 可以通过将 设置为所需的最大字节数来控制缓冲区的最大大小。You can control the maximum size of the buffer by setting to the maximum number of bytes desired. 这个最大数无需包含任何与生成缓冲区相关的瞬态分配或附加到消息的属性。This number does not necessarily cover any transient allocations related to building the buffer, or properties attached to the message. 每次使用完 实例后，您都应该调用 以关闭该实例。You should always close a instance by calling when finished working with it. 这可能会允许更快地释放系统资源。This allows system resources to potentially be freed sooner. 针对从此类派生的托管 C++ 用户的特别说明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 将清理代码放入 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）中，而不是放入析构函数中。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用析构函数：它们会导致编译器自动生成 Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用非引用成员：它们可能会导致编译器自动生成 Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用终结器；但如果包含一个终结器，则应该禁止显示生成警告并从 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）调用 和终结器本身，以便模拟自动生成的 行为。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) in order to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior.

summary.span: 获取此 使用的近似字节数。

span.span: Gets the approximate number of bytes consumed by this .

value.span: 此 使用的近似字节数。

span.span: The approximate number of bytes consumed by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过将 设置为所需的最大字节数来控制缓冲区的最大大小。You can control the maximum size of the buffer by setting to the maximum number of bytes desired. 这个最大数无需包含任何与生成缓冲区相关的瞬态分配或附加到消息的属性。This number does not necessarily cover any transient allocations related to building the buffer, or properties attached to the message. 进行序列化时，它与消息的实际大小无关。It is not related to the actual size of the message when serialized.

span.span: Finishes working with the buffer.

Public MustOverride Function CreateMessage () As Message

span.span: Returns a copy of the original message.

returns.span: 一个原始 实例的相同副本，您先前将此实例提供给 实例的 方法。

span.span: An identical copy of the original instance you previously provided to the method of a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法将创建一个原始 实例的相同副本，您先前将此实例提供给 实例的 方法。Calling this method creates an identical copy of the original instance you previously provided to the method of a instance. 然后可以将消息保存到持久存储区中。You can then save the message to a durable storage.

summary.span: 创建一个用于定位此对象的新 对象。

span.span: Creates a new object for navigating this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果只想操作消息副本的一部分，请使用此方法。Use this method if you want to manipulate just a portion of the message copy.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完 后调用此方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 此方法使 处于不可用状态。This method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用完此方法后，必须释放对 的所有引用，这样垃圾回收器才能收回 占用的内存。After calling this method, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用之前，均应调用此方法。Always call this method before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，不会释放正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

abstract member WriteMessage : System.IO.Stream -> unit override this.WriteMessage : System.IO.Stream -> unit

param.name: stream
param.span: 一个 IO 流，此缓冲区中的整个内容都会写入此 IO 流。

span.span: An IO stream that the entire content of this buffer is written to.

summary.span: 将此缓冲区中的整个内容写入指定的 IO 流。

span.span: Writes the entire content of this buffer to the specified IO stream.
